name: Hard 4.5 "Diane's Nightmare" Quiz / Test | 'Cheers'- Season 4 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What did Cliff say a "flork" is?
questions.correct: the things that hold the flag on the mailbox
options: the combination of a fork and a chopstick
the cracks that are on the sidewalk
the small insect that gets in your ear in the summer
questions.explanation:
the things that hold the flag on the mailbox.

	This word was actually found in the urban dictionary with Cliff's definition. He was playing Scrabble with Woody when he came up with this word.

questions.text: What did Sam discover he had on Diane's day off?
questions.explanation:
a wine cellar.

	This was part of Diane's dream where everyone started to go down to the cellar and not return. Sam said he discovered it when some plumbers discovered a staircase behind the wall.

questions.text: Who escaped from prison in Diane's nightmare?
questions.explanation:
Andy.

	Andy was in a previous episode where Sam fixed him up with Diane. He was recently out on parole for murder. Then in another episode, Andy tried to strangle Diane and was sent back to prison. Diane was scared to death to find out he was loose.

Norm.

	Sam told Diane that the others knew she was scared and were probably playing a joke on her. It didn't help that the power had gone out, and Cheers was lit only by candlelight.

questions.text: What happened when Diane woke up from her nightmare?
questions.explanation:
She went into another one.

	It appeared that Diane had woken up from her nightmare because she was telling Sam and Frasier about it. But then later in the episode we learn she went into another one.

questions.text: What general fibs did Andy tell his girlfriend?
questions.correct: that he had friends and a life
options: that he was rich and powerful
that he was a baseball player
that he had his own boat and plane
questions.explanation:
that he had friends and a life.

	Andy asked the gang at Cheers to support him in his lies so his girlfriend would be impressed. Then she showed up sooner than expected so Andy told the others just to go along with whatever he said.

questions.text: What did Andy tell his girlfriend about Sam?
questions.explanation:
He was an ex-con.

	He told his girlfriend that Sam was a flasher. He of course was the ex-con, not Sam.

questions.text: What lie did Andy tell about Diane?
questions.correct: She wanted to have his baby.
options: She was still in love with him.
questions.explanation:
She wanted to have his baby.

	Andy was in love with Diane in the episode "Homicidal Ham" in which they did a scene from "Othello" together. He had strangled her when he found out she was with Sam (at that time). This was the reason why Diane was having nightmares about him. They started when he was released from the mental institution.

questions.text: What lie did Andy tell about Frasier?
options: That he tried to kill Diane.
That he was a drug dealer.
questions.explanation:
That he was a kleptomaniac.

	Frasier did a great job of playing along. He said that his pants were hot (as in stolen). A kleptomaniac is a person who steals compulsively.

questions.text: Who had a smoking jacket in Diane's nightmare?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	At the end of this nightmare, Diane saw Sam in a smoking jacket and he was acting all intelligent.  She started kissing him when she woke up from the second nightmare.
